thread.title: BRIEF-Kadant Reports Q1 Adjusted EPS Of $1.07

title: BRIEF-Kadant Reports Q1 Adjusted EPS Of $1.07
text:
April 30, 2018 / 8:40 PM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-Kadant Reports Q1 Adjusted EPS Of $1.07 Reuters Staff
 Kadant Inc: * SEES Q2 2018 REVENUE $150 MILLION TO $154 MILLION
* Q1 REVENUE $149.2 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $145.3 MILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.96 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES FY 2018 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $5.15 TO $5.25 EXCLUDING ITEMS
* SEES Q2 2018 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.95 TO $1.00 EXCLUDING ITEMS * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $625 MILLION TO $635 MILLION
* Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.05, REVENUE VIEW $146.8 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $5.65, REVENUE VIEW $613.8 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
